Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Creates an excise tax on the collection of consumer data by commercial data collectors
Summary: Creates an excise tax on the collection of consumer data by commercial data collectors.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to creating an excise tax on the collection of consumer data by commercial data collectors
